Price: $291.28
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:52:43 UTC – Details)


Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power
Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,

);

Price: $609.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:21:35 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Elecsung- Design for a Better Life

With Elecsung superior range of waterproof bathroom TVs, add a touch of contemporary luxury to your bathroom and enjoy unlimited entertainment in your shower or bath. Elecsung TVs offer stunning picture quality and intelligent features and functions, designed and tested to be waterproof and safe for the whole family to use. Elecsung TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don’t feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Why Waterproof TV?

Imagine this: luxuriating in a steamy, bubbly bathtub with a glass of wine while watching your favorite TV show. However, making this addition does require special considerations. Choose a waterproof TV, and you’ll have no worries.

Features of 2022 Model Elecsung Waterproof Television

Full Screen Touch Control Option

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

7 Touch Keys

If you don’t want to choose full screen touch control, then the TV with touch keys

On desk option

Except on-wall and in-wall installation, base stand option for on-desk

Key Features

• 22″ LED Magic Mirror Screen (Flat Panel)

• Bright Single-sided Transmissive Mirror, Super Narrow Border

• 1080P Full HD Resolution

• 7 Touch Keys for TV Control, Full Screen Touch Control (Optional)

• Built-in Bluetooth, WiFi and Speakers, TV, HMDI, USB and WLAN Inputs

• Earphone and COAX/Optical Audio Outputs, 2 x 5W Stereo Speakers (Waterproof)

• Waterproof and Dustproof (IP66) , Waterproof Remote Control (IP66)

• Full View Angle (178º/178º)

• VESA Holes Available (100mm x 100mm)

Invisible Mirror

Nano high transparent crystal mirror surface

New Magic Mirror Experience

IP66 waterproof, anti-fog and dustproof

Remote Control

Waterproof remote control with holder

Serial Number

Each TV has its serial number, it won’t be repeated.

Installation

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket

Product Description

Soulaca new model 22″ with full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use. Nowadays, more and more people like to watch TV while tasting wine while taking a bath in the bathroom. Soulaca TV mirrors for bathrooms offer you an escape from the everyday, allowing you to wind down in the bath to your choice of movie! Of course, for those private moments when you don’t feel like watching television, your waterproof TV will transform into a discreet and elegant mirror.

Soulaca HUAYU Series

Freeview (Digital) TV: Yes DTV System: ATSC/DVB-T/DVB-T2/DVB-C/DVB-S/DVB-S2 (According to your country) Freeview (Digital) Radio: Yes Analogue Tuner: Yes Internet Specs: RAM: 1G; Storage: 8G; WiFi: 2.4G/5G Display Type: LED Aspect Ratio:16:9, Contrast Ratio: 1000:1 Brightness (cd/m²): 250 Resolution: 1920 x 1080; Display Colors:16.7M; View Angle (°H/V):178/178 Speakers:8Ω5W x 2 Main Power:12V; Power Consumption(W): 23W; Standby Consumption(W): <1 Front Panel Finish: Mirror Frame: Metal Front Panel: Glass Ports and Connectors: TV, HDMI*1, USB*1, Audio Output,LAN(RJ45) , touchscreen Working Humidity: 10%-90% Working Temperature: -10°C ~ +50°C Unit Size (mm) (W x H x D): 501W x 316H x 43Dmm /19.7″W x 12.44″H x 1.69″D Android Version: 7.1 Package Includes: TV, IP68 TV Remote, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set Unit Weight(kg): 5.2 Gross Weight(kg): 8

Full screen touch control applied the 10-point touch technology for more convenient and saving-time use

Screen Casting-Supprot Android Phone& iPhone

IP66 rated waterproof. Whether you want to wash with soap operas or primp with prime time, a waterproof TV in the bathroom can help you enjoy the time.

Most of the mirror TV in the market the brightness is very weak. But ours improve the glass quality, which make the TV image more clear in your room. But we also suggest not to use too much lighting. The mirror has reflection, all of the mirror TVs have such reflection.

TV Remote with Holder

The TV remote is ip68 waterproof. Means you could put it into water, when you are taking shower in your bathtub. You have no problem for control the TV!

Serial Number

Each TV has its own ID number, it won’t be repeated which is easily for tracking the information to fix any technical problem for you.

Packing Standard

TV, Power cord, 110-240V adapter, TV holder( Wall Mounting), user manual, screws Set. You can feel free to install the TV by your style.

Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 454.5W x 277.5H x 22.5Dmm/17.89″W x 10.92″H x 0.88″D

【IP66 Waterproof Mirror TV】-Soulaca 2022 Model updated TV with IP66 waterproof, dustproof and anti-fog functions is designed for bathroom. A TV turned on and a bright single-sided transmissive mirror turned off looks luxury when installed. Based on years of experience in waterproof TV, Soulaca is continuously updating its products to be considerate and cost-effective.
【Slim Digital TV】-Super narrow border out of display area and resolution 1920×1080, the TV provide high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience. Built-in Satellite with reception HDTV(ATSC) Tuner , have access to local channels. Plug in and play HDMI x 2 and USB allow directly connectivity.

Can be easily recessed or surface mounted with bracket included. Installation instruction please refers to the last picture. Powered with safe DC 12V.
【Shipping & Warranty】 Fulfill by Amazon, 2 years warranty and each of the TV has its serial number to ensure quick and accurate after-sale service. Feel free to contact Soulaca customer service, all messages will be replied within 24hours.

Option 1: In-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Create an opening within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines. Leave enough space for the cables and adapter.

2. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

3. Place the mounting bracket into the recess and use the pilot holes to drill into the wall on sides or back.

4. Place the raw plugs into the holes that have been drilled and screw the mounting bracket into position.

5. Organize the cables and offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed within the wall.

6. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 2: On-wall with the Mounting Bracket

1. Drill holes within the chosen area of the wall according to the mounting bracket outlines.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket (NOT INCLUDED)

Price: $559.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:13:08 UTC – Details)

Jensen JE1913ACWM Widescreen 19″ Wallmount LCD 100-240V AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc.
JENSEN…the ONLY Brand of TVs designed, engineered, tested & built exclusively for Over-The-Road Applications.
Enjoy functionality at its best with the JE1913AC. This Flat Panel JENSEN LCD TV boasts all the features you could ask for including an integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio. Brings home entertainment to the RV and take a quality entertainment experience wherever you go! Mount it on the Wall with a VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern TV Mount. To round out this extensive feature set, the JE1913AC features various inputs and outputs.
Inputs/Outputs

  • Composite video input x 2 (NTSC/PAL)
  • Stereo audio input x 1
  • VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1
  • USB input x 1
  • RF x 1
  • HDMI input x 2
  • Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1
  • IR output
  • SPDIF output
  • Headphone output


Specifications

  • Power System: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz
  • Power Consumption: 42mA stand by, 2.7A max
  • Operating Temperature Range: -4°F to 149°F -20°C to 65°C
  • Storage Temperature Range: -22°F to 158°F -30°C to 70°C
  • Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
  • Overall Dimensions: 18.03″ W x 12.08″ H x 2.06″ D
  • Product Weight:11 lbs
  • Regulatory Certification(s): FCC


Performance

  • Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
  • Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
  • Audio Output: 6W x 2


LCD

  • Diagonal Size: 19″
  • Resolution: 1366 x 768
  • Brightness: 250 nit
  • Contrast Ratio: 1000 : 1
  • View Angles: Top 85°, Bottom 85°, Left 80°, Right 80°
  • Display Format: 16:9
  • Response Time: 3.5 ms

110V AC powered LCD AC Television, specially built for Boats, Yacht, RV Recreational Vehicle, Trailer, Camper, Motor Home etc., White LED illumination, 1366 x 768 full HD, Integrated HDTV (ATSC) tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p)
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players (DVD Player Not Included), VESA 100mm x 100mm and 200mm x 400mm mounting pattern, Optional table top stand (STDJE1913) sold separately, Full function wireless remote control included
Convenient front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Rugged metal cabinet, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points. V-O rated front and rear cabinet materials which meets maximum UL/CUL safety certifications
Composite video input x2 (NTSC/PAL), Stereo audio input x1, VGA with 3.5mm audio input x1, USB input x1, RF x1, HDMI input x2, Selectable (variable/fixed) line level audio output (RCA) x1, IR output x1, SPDIF output x1, Headphone output x1

FEATURES OF 27 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN SMART MIRROR BATHROOM TV

  • Functions:  ATV/DTV/Monitor
  • Protection Grade:  IP66
  • Control type:  Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control
  • Speaker:  Built-in Waterproof Speaker
  • Remote Controller:  IP68 Waterproof
  • WiFi & Bluetooth:  Supported (Integrated) 
  • RAM+ROM:  4G+64G
  • Screen Size (Diagonal):  27″
  • Unit Size:  678 * 448 * 44mm / 26.69″W * 17.64″H * 1.73″D
  • Unit Weight:  14KGs
  • Package Size:  780 * 550 * 140mm / 30.70″W * 21.65″H * 5.51″D
  • Gross Weight: 16kgs
  • Finish:  Mirror
  • Front Panel Material:  Glass
  • Interface: TV / USBx2 / HDMIx1 / LAN /Audio Out /DC 12V
  • Android System:  Android 11.0 (APPS or GAMES download available )
  • Power Input: 12V (Adapter for 100-240V input is available as accessory)
  • Display Type: LED
  • Aspect Ratio: 16:9
  • Brightness(Cd/m2): 500
  • Resolution: 1920×1080
  • Response Time:  6ms
  • Viewing Angle (H/V): 178/178(H/V)
  • Built-in Speakers: 2pcs
  • Standby Power: Under 1W
  • Power Consumption: 60W
  • Working Environment:  -30 to 50 degree
  • Working Humidity: 10%-90%
  • Install:  Recess Dimensions for in-wall (656 * 432 * 33mm/25.8″W * 17″H * 1.3″D), or Wall Bracket Dimensions for on-wall 27″(VESA100 * 100mm)
  • Accessories: Waterproof Controller(Without batteries)/Manual/ 100-240V Adapter/Power Cord/Wall Bracket/Embedded Back/Install tool.

【Awesome Configuration】27-inch screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers, which you can easily connect Wi-Fi and Bluetooth in HDMI 2 channel, high configuration RAM:4 GB, ROM:64 GB, built-in Android 11.0 system, HD screen provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.
【Use scene】As long as the switch of the display is turned off, it is a practical high-definition mirror. Smart mirror IP66 waterproof TV，Especially suitable for some humid or extreme places, such as bathrooms, washing room, show room kitchens, swimming pools, yachts, Sauna, salon, spa, hotel, hot tubs, steam rooms, etc. You can use Smart mirror display with your friends anytime, anywhere.
【Simple Installation】 “In-wall” and “On-wall” options : The waterproof bathroom TV can be fitted either built into the wall recess or secured to the wall itself. The waterproof TVs come included with a wall-mount and recess mounting bracket in the package. Easily to tightly fix the television to the desired spot. Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 656 x 432 x 33mm/25.8″W x 17″H x 1.3″D.
【Quality Guarantee】leotachi Smart mirror TV comes with 1-year-warranty. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for more details and all messages will be replied within 24 hours.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:20:10 UTC – Details)

Product Description

UHD 4K Mirror TV- 32″

What’s Mirror TV

A mirror TV is a TV which front panel is optical mirror. The TV picture vanishes when turned off, returning to a full mirror.

Using a mirror TV doesn’t only enhance the overall look of your bathroom. In addition, it also entertains you, resulting in making your life a lot better. Nothing beats sitting in a bathtub watching TV after a long and hectic day. It gives you time to relax your mind as well as relieve yourself of those pesky muscles that are tired from carrying the burden all day.

Smart Remote Control

The Magic Remote acts as a universal remote. And you can use voice commands, air mouse control and click wheel to manage your entertainment and apps.You can simply click, point, scroll or use voice commands to change the channel, search for something new, and more. Spend less time navigating confusing menus and juggling multiple remotes, and more time enjoying your entertainment.You just need to shake the Magic Remote left and right to turn on the pointer, and press the up, down, left or right buttons to turn it off.Through the remote app, you can also control your Smart TV with your phone or tablet.

Who Will Reject Such Beautiful Gift?

Soulaca provides coloring packing, unlike the previous neutral packaging, this is for new house decoration gifts, congratulations gifts, birthday gifts, suitable using in any festival. It’s a precious gift to a precious person.

Certified Electric Leakage Switch Protection

Besides the waterproof treated motherboard, Speakers and enclosures, the power cord is also with electric leakage protection system.

Mirror TV Turned Off

Magic Remote Control

Applications

Artwork Display

Awesome WebOS System

Soulaca Smart TVs with webOS deliver what you want including news, sports, entertainment and more. It’s all at your fingertips.You will access a whole new world of entertainment with the webOS apps. Outstanding content from Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, YouTube, VUDU and much more.

Super Thin Design

Soulaca webOS TV 2022 new model is with slimmer profiles which creates a more elegant visual effect that’s easier to integrate into the room’s overall design. The two built-in speakers are placed back side behind the display screen so that no sound holes can be seen from the front mirror.

2. Place the raw plugs into the holes and screw the mounting bracket into position so it is attached to the wall.

3. Set up power and signal circuit and the outlet.

4. Simply offer the TV up to the mounting bracket that is fixed on the wall.

5. Line up the 4 x pilot holes located on the back of the TV case with the 4 x metal lugs located on the mounting bracket and simply push the TV into suit.

Option 3: On-desk with Base Stand Bracket

【SMART webOS SYSTEM】 – Soulaca Smart TVs with webOS deliver what you want including news, sports, entertainment and more. It’s all at your fingertips. Package enclose an Alexa Voice Control Magic Remote: Press and ask Alexa on the Smart Magic Remote, to control your TV and connected devices with built-in Alexa or ThinQ AI. With the built-in Alexa, you can easily find, launch, and control the contents. You can even ask Alexa to check the weather, update you on sports scores, or tell you a joke.
【INTERFACE】 – TV/HDMI x 3/USB x 2/Audio Out Port/ LAN/Integrated Wi-Fi&Bluetooth. The Magic Remote acts as a universal remote. And you can use voice commands, air mouse control and click wheel to manage your entertainment and apps.
【DIMENSION&INSTALLATION】- TV Dimensions:742W x 437H x 49Dmm (29.2”W x 17.2”H x 2”D); Recess in Wall Dimensions: 585.5W x 335H x 27D mm (23.1” W x 13.2” H x 1.01” D). Embedded bracket for in-wall and wall bracket for on-wall are included(provide installation instruction).
【SHIPPING&WARRANTY】- It usually takes 2-4 working days for us to ship out the product via DHL, FedEx or UPS after the payment is made and confirmed, then an additional 3-7 working days to reach you. All our TVs come with 2 years warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Soulaca customer service, we will come back to you within 24 hours!

What's Mirror TV

A mirror TV is a TV which front panel is optical mirror. The TV picture vanishes when turned off, returning to a full mirror.

It gives you time to relax your mind as well as relieve yourself of those pesky muscles that are tired from carrying the burden all day.

  • You can simply click, point, scroll or use voice commands to change the channel, search for something new, and more. Spend less time navigating confusing menus and juggling multiple remotes, and more time enjoying your entertainment.
